entry.title: Abusing byobu's status notifications
entry.summary:
Being myself an absentminded kinda person, I always forget to buy credit in order to use the public transportation.

Consequences

It's not a happy moment when I'm already on board and I notice that I ran out of credit. Two options are usually available. Asking somebody to pay for me, which is uncomfortable, or walk, which is worst.

The Solution

It's Really Simple. I spend all my working hours in a command line terminal, so I wrote this little web-scrapping script that shows my credit status on byobu's status line.

Thanks for passing by!
